message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the chance to purchase this product. Given its value, I'm initially proposing a price of $1,150,000.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but given my budget constraints, I am unable to meet the proposed price of $1,150,000. I would like to make a counteroffer at $1,050,000.
Bob, I understand your position, but the value of this product is truly significant. I could consider coming down to $1,100,000.  This is my final offer.
Thank you for considering my position, Alice. I appreciate your flexibility. I would like to make a counteroffer at $1,075,000.
